alert.note: Alert for Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grady County through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cairo, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Whigham, Calvary, Reno, Princes Still, Moncrief, Pine Park, Nickleville, Rocky Hill, Beachton and Grady Co A/p. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
